entry.title: Friday: Snow. High minus 2.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy this morning then snow. Amount 5 cm. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 near noon. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 15 this morning and minus 8 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Friday 17 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 2.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature steady near minus 2. Wind chill near minus 8. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Friday 17 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Snow. Temperature falling to minus 9 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Snow ending near noon then cloudy. Amount 2 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming southwest 20 gusting to 40 in the morning. Temperature falling to minus 9 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 7 in the morning and minus 12 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Friday 17 March 2023
